Dr. Louie Skin Firming Concentrate

Brand: DrLouie

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Macrocystis Pyrifera Extract (Giant Kelp), Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Fomes Officinalis (Mushroom) Extract, Panthenol, Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
